## the formula of Einstein is $E=mc^2$

::: {#thm-subrule}
## Substitution Rule

if $u=g(x)$ is a differentiable function whose range is an interval $I$ and $f$ is a continuous on $I$, then

$$
\int f(g(x))\, dx = \int f(u)du.
$$
:::
